layout.title: AurionCal
layout.subtitle: Your planning synced into your calendar, seamlessly.

dashboard.title: My account
dashboard.notifySessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.message: This action will delete your account and your calendar subscription. Do you confirm?

subscribeCalendar.title: Subscribe to calendar
subscribeCalendar.message:
Your calendar app will open to add the AurionCal subscription.
For best results, set automatic sync frequency to 1 hour.

resetCalendarLink.title: Regenerate calendar link
resetCalendarLink.message: This will invalidate your current calendar feed link and generate a new one. You will need to update your external subscriptions. Continue?

howItWorks.a:
AurionCal lets you sync your Aurion timetable to your Apple, Google, etc. calendar.

Your events are automatically updated to reflect changes on Aurion (about every hour). To do so, just create an account using your Junia credentials, then subscribe to the generated calendar feed.

AurionCal is not affiliated with Junia.

security.a:
To connect to Aurion and retrieve your data, AurionCal uses your Junia credentials.

These are stored encrypted with a private key stored on an external service.

AurionCal source code is open and available on GitHub.

passwordChanged.q: I reset my Aurion password, what should I do?
